pages.text: The $(major)Water Breathing$(0) Gene gives entities the $(minor)Water Breathing effect$(0).$(br2)This Gene can be $(minor)mutated into Resistance 2$(0).$(br2)This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Squid$(li)Glow Squid$(li)Dolphin$(li)Guardian$(li)Elder Guardian
